column1: Funeral Services for Nellie will be held at 10:30 a.m.
column5: at Central Reformed Church in Oskaloosa with Pastor Jon Nelson officiating. A 10:15 family prayer service will precede the funeral in the church fellowship hall. Burial will be in Oakwood Cemetery in Pella. Visitation will begin at 10 a.m.
column6: Friday at Garland-Van Arkel-Langkamp Funeral Chapel; the family will be present from 6-8 p.m.
